Privacy Policy


What is Personal Information and why do we collect it?

Personal Information is information or an opinion that identifies an individual.

We collect and store your email when you sign up for our newsletter on our website. Your email is not associated with your name or any other personal information. You may unsubscribe from our newsletter at any time. All you need to do is unsubscribe from the link in the letter, or let us know in writing that you want to be removed.Your email is collected on our website only to keep you informed of new Mad Perception products and changes to our existing products.

Mad Perception does not use cookies in order to track your movement around the web. However, some of our apps contain advertising APIs from third parties. We don’t guarantee website links or policy of authorised third parties.
